mapper.select: select se_num, se_name, se_sc_name, sc_ratio, tl_num, case when left(se_name, 1) = 'A' then 1 when left(se_name, 1) = 'B' then 2 when left(se_name, 1) = 'C' then 3 when left(se_name, 1) = 'D' then 4 when left(se_name, 1) = 'E' then 5 when left(se_name, 1) = 'F' then 6 when left(se_name, 1) = 'G' then 7 when left(se_name, 1) = 'H' then 8 when left(se_name, 1) = 'I' then 9 else 0 end as `row`, cast(right(se_name, 2) as UNSIGNED) as col from seat join seat_class on se_sc_name = sc_name join airplane_model on se_am_model = am_model join airplane on ap_am_model = am_model join schedule on sk_ap_num = ap_num left join ticketing_list on tl_se_num = se_num where sk_num = #{sk_num} order by se_num asc;
